name: Stackatank
description:
A short game where you move around a tank, destroying targets (there are 12 of them total).

Controls (Including Gamepad)

Arrows / Left Analog to Move

Z, X, C and V / A, B, X and Y to pick up components. Press the respective keys again to use them.

Alt + Z, X, C, V / L + respective buttons to drop them.
